reviewText: At first I was a little dissappointed, but then when I considered the time frame and the technology for cameras, thank God somebody thought to preserve this great area in steam engines & their railroads...I understand the Penn Central and the New York central competed mightly back in the day, so this was the first good look I had of the steam engines of the Penn Central. The trailer after the black and white footage, was sensational...If you love steam engines, review Mr. Scholl videos, I'm sure you will be satisfied...
